description:
A rugged, dunk-proof bag for touring paddlers or anyone who needs to keep their gear dry. The handles function as anchor points so the Slogg can be lashed securely onto canoes, SUPs and rafts. Padded hipbelt and shoulder straps help make uphill portages more bearable. The 70L capacity is enough for minimalist expeditions or luxurious weekends with lots of extras.

  • Fabric is 840-denier, high-tenacity nylon, coated on both sides with PVC-free polyurethane
  • All seams are radio-frequency welded to seal out water
  • Stiffened roll closures are highly water-resistant though not fully waterproof
  • Removable padded hipbelt lets you carry larger loads
  • Shoulder straps are breathable and quick-drying perforated foam
name: MEC Slogg 70L Dry Pack - Unisex
